parameters.name: ical_urls
parameters.description: iCalendar URL/s, separate multiple ones with a comma

parameters.name: ical_files
parameters.description: iCalendar filepaths, separated with a comma

parameters.name: date_format
parameters.description:
Use an arrow-supported token for custom date formatting.
See https://arrow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/#supported-tokens, e.g. ddd D MMM.

parameters.name: time_format
parameters.description:
Use an arrow-supported token for custom time formatting.
See https://arrow.readthedocs.io/en/stable/#supported-tokens, e.g. HH:mm.
